subject: Errors in asserting multiple submit buttons in single page.
msgSnippet: Hi. I am testing an web-application using jwebunit. While doin so I came accross a html page with 5 submit buttons. Using assertSubmitButtonPresent() I tried

Hi.

    I am testing an web-application using jwebunit.
    While doin so I came accross a html page with 5 submit buttons.
Using "assertSubmitButtonPresent()" I tried to assert the presence of
all 5 submit buttons in single test. 
        
        assertSubmitButtonPresent("balance");
	assertSubmitButtonPresent("deactivate");
	assertSubmitButtonPresent("activate");		
        assertSubmitButtonPresent("acc_details");
	assertSubmitButtonPresent("Logout");

I get an error of submit button (---)not found. When I tried by
changing the order, always the first button was asserted, second one
was not found giving error and nothig was mentioned about rest of the
buttons in the results.
I could not find what the problem is.
I tried asserting each button separately in separate test runs, I got
no errors in it. Presence of all the buttons was asserted separately.

Is it so that only one submit button in a page can be asserted in
single test?

Please help.

Regards,
Amit
